Remember that Jesus Christ rose from the dead. Wow. I will endure hardship, why? Because my Savior lives. And I will live for Him because He lives. I pray that in this time of invitation that we'd do business with You, that we'd allow You, Lord, to have Your will and way in our hearts and lives. And if we're not preaching the gospel, if we're not enduring hardness, if we're not living for You, would You help us to get that settled this morning? Help us, Lord, to make those commitments to You this morning and that as we leave this place we'd be changed because of how we've been impacted by the resurrection of our Savior. Perhaps there's one in our presence this morning that's not sure of heaven. In fact, if you were to be asked this question, if you were to die today, are you 100 percent sure that you'd go to heaven? Perhaps this morning you cannot answer that question with confidence and with assurance that heaven is your home.
